title: 114_hr5069
content: The Act may be cited as the "Cybersecurity Systems and Risks Reporting Act" and includes requirements for cybersecurity and information systems. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include cybersecurity systems standards and practices in information systems definitions. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include cybersecurity system standards and practices in information systems definitions, focusing on accountability and measuring the issuer's performance towards objectives. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include cybersecurity system standards and practices in information systems definitions, emphasizing accountability and measuring issuer performance towards objectives. This includes adding the principal cybersecurity systems officer or officers and integrating cybersecurity systems into internal controls. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include cybersecurity system standards and practices in information systems definitions. This involves adding cybersecurity risks to issuer's information systems and integrating cybersecurity systems into internal controls. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include cybersecurity system standards and practices in information systems definitions, integrating cybersecurity risks and controls into internal controls and information systems reporting. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include assessments of the effectiveness of internal control structure and cybersecurity systems structure for financial reporting. Section 407 is amended to disclose expert information. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include assessments of internal control structure and cybersecurity systems for financial reporting. Amendments involve defining cybersecurity experts in consultation with relevant government officials. The Commission, in consultation with relevant officials, assesses individuals for cybersecurity expertise based on education and experience in computer security, network security, data privacy, information systems audits, cybersecurity risk discovery, maintenance, implementation, monitoring, and internal accounting controls. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include enhanced review criteria for financial, information systems, and cybersecurity systems statements. This includes assessing individuals for cybersecurity expertise and issuers that have issued cybersecurity risks disclosures. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 is amended to include enhanced review criteria for financial, information systems, and cybersecurity systems statements. This involves adding "AND INFORMATION SYSTEMS" to sections 302 and 404, and replacing "EXPERT" with "AND CYBERSECURITY SYSTEMS EXPERTS" in section 407.
